19namespace ZXing {
20
21class DecoderResult;
22class BitMatrix;
23
24namespace DataMatrix {
25
26/**
27* <p>The main class which implements Data Matrix Code decoding -- as opposed to locating and extracting
28* the Data Matrix Code from an image.</p>
29*
30* @author bbrown@google.com (Brian Brown)
31*/
32class Decoder
33{
34public:
35 /**
36 * <p>Convenience method that can decode a Data Matrix Code represented as a 2D array of booleans.
37 * "true" is taken to mean a black module.</p>
38 *
39 * @param image booleans representing white/black Data Matrix Code modules
40 * @return text and bytes encoded within the Data Matrix Code
41 * @throws FormatException if the Data Matrix Code cannot be decoded
42 * @throws ChecksumException if error correction fails
43 */
44 //DecoderResult decode(boolean[][] image);
45
46 /**
47 * <p>Decodes a Data Matrix Code represented as a {@link BitMatrix}. A 1 or "true" is taken
48 * to mean a black module.</p>
49 *
50 * @param bits booleans representing white/black Data Matrix Code modules
51 * @return text and bytes encoded within the Data Matrix Code
52 * @throws FormatException if the Data Matrix Code cannot be decoded
53 * @throws ChecksumException if error correction fails
54 */
55 static DecoderResult Decode(const BitMatrix& bits);
56};
57
58} // DataMatrix
59} // ZXing
60
